name: Shoot Me Out
description:
Shoot me out the most addictive, fun and challenging game you would ever find. Its challenging once you play it you're gonna play it endlessly. It's an all-time great game. All you have to do is shoot, shoot to make them free, all animals big and small waiting for their freedom. Shoot them out, give the freedom. Watch out when you shoot you're gonna hurt somebody . they all need to be alive when you shoot them out

  • The easiest game play control
  • Challenging levels
  • Nit and colorful design
  • More than ten characters to be unlocked
